file.name: openapi.yaml
file.content:
openapi: 3.0.0
info:
  version: 1.0.0
  title: Email Sender
  license:
    name: MIT
servers:
  - url: 'http://email.networknt.com'
paths:
  '/counter':
    get:
      summary: Number of email sent since the server started
      operationId: getCounter
      tags:
        - counter
      security:
        - email_auth:
            - 'email.r'
      responses:
        '200':
          description: A long number that is the number of emails sent
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/Counter'
              example:
                count: 100
  '/sender':
    get:
      summary: Number of email sent per senders
      operationId: getSender
      tags:
        - sender
      security:
        - email_auth:
            - 'email.r'
      responses:
        '200':
          description: A map of sender address and the number of emails sent for the address
          content:
            application/json:
              example:
                noreply@networknt.com: 1000
                noreply@lightapi.net: 93
                noreply@taiji.io: 19832

  '/email':
    get:
      summary: The last email sent out from this server
      operationId: getEmail
      tags:
        - email
      security:
        - email_auth:
            - 'email.r'
      responses:
        '200':
          description: Last email sent in json format
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/Email'
              example:
                from: noreply@networknt.com
                to: stevehu@gmail.com
                body: Hello World
components:
  securitySchemes:
    email_auth:
      type: oauth2
      description: This API uses OAuth 2 with the client credential grant flow.
      flows:
        clientCredentials:
          tokenUrl: 'https://localhost:6882/token'
          scopes:
            'email.r': read service
  schemas:
    Counter:
      type: object
      required:
        - count
      properties:
        count:
          type: integer
          format: int64
    Email:
      type: object
      required:
        - from
        - to
        - body
      properties:
        from:
          type: string
        to:
          type: string
        body: 
          type: string

Error: notImplemented: path "/counter": get: security: security "email_auth" (index 0): oauth2 security not implemented
